issue.title: Use brew bottle more and host bottles at bintray

content.raw:
I've been testing an approach that uses a common root_url for storing all the homebrew bottles with the following branch:

* #!/osrf/release-tools/branch/brew_root_url_upload

The challenge is that the preferred way to update the bottle checksums requires all the json files to be available and passed to `brew bottle --merge --write`. We are currently processing the json files one at a time. @\_jrivero_ I think this would require restructuring the way the jenkins jobs are set up. If it's too much work, we may have to keep doing it the old way.
